chapter_description.p: In the world of parallel computing, the Message Passing Interface (MPI) is the de facto standard for implementing programs on multiple processors.
This module provides functions to initialize, manage, and finalize MPI environments, as well as to perform communication between processes, both point-to-point and collective.
It enables Nelson programs to run efficiently on distributed-memory systems and clusters.

keyword.name: MPI_Allreduce
keyword.description: Combines values from all processes and distributes the result back to all processes.

keyword.name: MPI_Barrier
keyword.description: Blocks until all processes in the communicator have reached this routine.

keyword.name: MPI_Bcast
keyword.description: Broadcasts a message from the process with rank "root" to all other processes of the communicator

keyword.name: MPI_Comm_delete
keyword.description: Removes MPI_Comm object.

keyword.name: MPI_Comm_get_name
keyword.description: Return the print name from the communicator.

keyword.name: MPI_Comm_object
keyword.description: Creates MPI_Comm object.

keyword.name: MPI_Comm_rank
keyword.description: Determines the rank of the calling process in the communicator.

keyword.name: MPI_Comm_size
keyword.description: Determines the size of the group associated with a communicator.

keyword.name: MPI_Comm_split
keyword.description: Partitions the group that is associated with the specified communicator into a specified number of disjoint subgroups.

keyword.name: MPI_Comm_used
keyword.description: Returns list of current used MPI_Comm handle.

keyword.name: MPI_Finalize
keyword.description: Terminate the MPI execution environment.

keyword.name: MPI_Get_library_version
keyword.description: Return the version number of MPI library.

keyword.name: MPI_Get_processor_name
keyword.description: Gets the name of the processor.

keyword.name: MPI_Get_version
keyword.description: Return the version number of MPI.

keyword.name: MPI_Init
keyword.description: Initialize the MPI execution environment.

keyword.name: MPI_Initialized
keyword.description: Indicates whether MPI_Init has been called.

keyword.name: MPI_Iprobe
keyword.description: Nonblocking test for a message.

keyword.name: MPI_Probe
keyword.description: Blocking test for a message.

keyword.name: MPI_Recv
keyword.description: Blocking receive for a message.

keyword.name: MPI_Reduce
keyword.description: Reduces values on all processes to a single value.

keyword.name: MPI_Send
keyword.description: Performs a blocking send.

keyword.name: mpiexec
keyword.description: Run an MPI script.
